titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Program in History of Science and Medicine, Yale University, Prize-Winning Essays
Program in History of Science and Medicine, Yale University, Prize-Winning Essays
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:43

did.unittitle: Program in History of Science and Medicine, Yale University, prize-winning essays

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The materials consist of history of science and medicine prize-winning essays written by Yale College seniors.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Program in History of Science and Medicine

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 14-B (YRG 14-B), Records of academic departments and programs of the Yale Faculty of Arts and Sciences.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The materials were transferred from the Program in History of Science and Medicine, 2007.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright has not been transferred to Yale University. Written permission of the author is required for photocopying.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Program in History of Science and Medicine, Yale University, Prize-Winning Essays (RU 1056). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

relatedmaterial.head: Associated Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Yale student papers collection (RU 331), Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library. Senior prize essays from the Department of History, Yale University (RU 170), Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The materials are arranged alphabetically by last name of student.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The materials consist of history of science and medicine prize-winning essays written by Yale College seniors.

Science -- History

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Written permission of the author is required for photocopying.
